| HistoryText             = The Thieves' Guild ruled the [[Cut-Purse Kingdom]], a district in the ancient city of [[Zangabal]], on the continent of [[Lemuria (Pacific Ocean)|Lemuria]], that was considered a thieves sanctuary.<!-- {{r|Creatures on the Loose #22|; Thongor! Warrior of Lost Lemuria!}} -->

When the [[Valkarth]]an youth [[Thongor (Earth-616)|Thongor]] came to Zangabal, he became a thief but scorned the Thieves' Guild.<!-- {{r|Creatures on the Loose #22|; Thongor! Warrior of Lost Lemuria!}} -->

[[Kaman Thuu (Earth-616)|Kaman Thuu]], a priest of the [[Seven Gods of Zangabal (Earth-616)|Seven Gods of Zangabal]], wished to had an heist performed, to steal and return a [[Black Mirror|mirror of black glass]], owned by the cruel magician [[Athmar Phong (Earth-616)|Athmar Phong]]. The Guild did not perform it (it is unclear if Kaman Thuu was declined, or if he even asked them to perform it), as they feared Athmar Phong.{{r|Creatures on the Loose #22|; Thongor! Warrior of Lost Lemuria!}}
